com.workshop.quest.musicplayer.service.musicmanager

Class MusicPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.workshop.quest.musicplayer.service.musicmanager.MusicPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.media.MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, IMusicPlayer

    public class MusicPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.media.MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, IMusicPlayer
    Handles all the logic related to playing music and handles its callbacks
